bioconda.name: encyclopedia
bioconda.summary: EncyclopeDIA is library search engine comprised of several algorithms for DIA data analysis

biocontainers.name: encyclopedia
biocontainers.summary: EncyclopeDIA is library search engine comprised of several algorithms for DIA data analysis

biotools.summary: EncyclopeDIA is library search engine comprised of several algorithms for DIA data analysis and can search for peptides using either DDA-based spectrum libraries or DIA-based chromatogram libraries.

bioschemas.summary: EncyclopeDIA is library search engine comprised of several algorithms for DIA data analysis and can search for peptides using either DDA-based spectrum libraries or DIA-based chromatogram libraries.
